subject: Shipped
description_text:
My order number is SSN2723. I was wondering of my order was shipped or not as I have not received a tracking number and it’s been over a week since I have placed the order. 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Still haven’t received a tracking number or even a shipped notification. Can anyone help me with this?

Hi Jacob Smith,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=884921644610
